date: Sat May 07 2022 13:53:02 GMT+1000 (Australian Eastern Standard Time)
pageTitle: UFC lightweight champion Charles Oliveira on a career low
description: Charles Oliveira missed weight on both attempts and was forced to vacate his lightweight title entering a UFC 274 headliner against Justin Gaethje.
metaDescription: See an illustration about Charles Oliveira when he missed weight on both attempts and was forced to vacate his lightweight title.
generatedText: Charles Oliveira, a former president of the National Association of Manufacturers, said the company's decision to sell its shares was "a big mistake."

Charles Oliveira stripped of lightweight belt after failing to make ...
With lightweight champion Charles Oliveira being stripped of his belt, only Justin Gaethje can walk away from UFC 274 with the title.
UFC 274: Why was Charles Oliveira stripped of the UFC lightweight ...
The now-former UFC lightweight champion will just be fighting for pride at UFC 274, with Justin Gaethje ready to take over the division.
UFC 274: Charles Oliveira swallows bitter pill as weight-cutting ...
Oliveira has missed weight several times before, but becoming the first reigning UFC champion to lose his belt at the scale has to be a career low.
Charles Oliveira misses weight for UFC 274, will vacate lightweight ...
